message: I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still fair.
I understand you want a larger share, but 60/40 is too much. How about a compromise - 55/45?
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet closer to the middle of our previous offers, 58/42.
This is getting us nowhere. I'm offering a smaller concession - 52/48.  Let's settle this and avoid getting nothing.
I still think I can get a better deal. How about 57/43?
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm making a final offer: 51/49.  Take it or leave it - we both lose if this goes any further.
